channel.title: Get Runescape worlds shortcutted/bookmarked
channel.description:
NOTE: I do not take any credit for this, all credit goes to Nemo and Jim from tainted-ones.com. I just found it really useful for getting into packed worlds.
Open up notepad and copy and paste this in and save it as anthing.htm. You can change the anything to world 2 or really whatever, mine is World 2.htm because mine goes to world 2. It doesnt matter as long as the htm is there. [code]<html><head> <title>RuneScape - World 2</title> </head>
<frameset cols=* frameborder=0 border=0> <frame src="http://ul8.runescape.com/l1,p0,j1" scrolling="auto"> </frameset> </html>[/code]
You can also change the RuneScape - World 2 to anything, it just determines what the window says.
Now click on it and it should take you to world 2! I found this really convenient. You can also bookmark/favorite/desktop shortcut this for more sexyness.
To get into other worlds besides world 2, just change the [code]http://ul8.runescape.com/l1,p0,j1[/code] to any runescape world's url. Some popular ones I've already done are:
[code]http://ul7.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1[/code] - for world 1 [code]http://sl10.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1[/code] - for world 6 [code]http://above4.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1[/code] - for world 9 [code]http://nav2.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1[/code] - for world 18 [code]http://nl1.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1[/code] - for world 22
Thats all there is to it, and I hope I help someone with this. :D

item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

Martin:

I’m not sure but dont they have some kind of detection for this… I’m pretty sure thats why even vbcheat clients sdont let you do this

Hmm, Ive been using it for a week now on the same account and nothing has happened. But if I do get banned or something, Ill let you all know

item.title: Get Runescape worlds shortcutted/bookmarked
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

NOTE: I do not take any credit for this, all credit goes to Nemo and Jim from tainted-ones.com. I just found it really useful for getting into packed worlds.

Open up notepad and copy and paste this in and save it as anthing.htm. You can change the anything to world 2 or really whatever, mine is World 2.htm because mine goes to world 2. It doesnt matter as long as the htm is there.

[code]

RuneScape - World 2 [/code]

You can also change the RuneScape - World 2 to anything, it just determines what the window says.

Now click on it and it should take you to world 2! I found this really convenient. You can also bookmark/favorite/desktop shortcut this for more sexyness.

To get into other worlds besides world 2, just change the http://ul8.runescape.com/l1,p0,j1 to any runescape world’s url. Some popular ones I’ve already done are:

http://ul7.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1 - for world 1

http://sl10.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1 - for world 6

http://above4.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1 - for world 9

http://nav2.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1 - for world 18

http://nl1.runescape.com/l0,p0,j1 - for world 22

Thats all there is to it, and I hope I help someone with this.

Read full topic
